author: Michael Rousseau
description: Cut kiwi fruit in half and use a spoon to scoop flesh from one half into shaker. MUDDLE kiwi fruit in base of shaker, add next 4 ingredients (all but ginger ale) and SHAKE with 50/50 crushed and cubed ice. Fine strain into chilled glass. Carefully pour ginger ale into drink over the back of a spoon.
name: Amalia (Michael Rousseau)
